summary.note: Format-based forwarding gate (commit 6e80856). Microbenchmarks from CI run 22194200467. PolyBench still from older CI runs (22190131432 for atax/bicg/jacobi-1d, 22187796851 for mvt) — PolyBench CI run 22194200533 pending (no runner available). reductiontree regressed 14.56%→39.94%, strideindirect regressed 13.64%→45.05% due to format-based gate enabling forwarding for register-form integer ops. memorystrided ≤30% PASS (16.81%). jacobi-1d <70% FAIL (131.13%). bicg <50% FAIL (71.24%). Error formula: |sim-hw|/min(sim,hw).
